description:
As a user of Shopline
  I want to create promotion for my customer
  So that my customer can use that when checkout
name: Bundle Pricing Promotion

elements.name: BundlePricing - Buy 3 for $150 and price less than 150

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Basic Setting Page
I mark the value of shop name field as variable shop name
I am on Bundle Pricing Create Page
I fill '(dirty data) Buy 3 for $100' to name field
I fill '3' to promotion value field
I fill '100' to discounted price field
I click on countinue to button
I should see alert
I fill '10th Product for Checkout' to search field
I click on search product button
I should see select product popup
1st product of popover list should contain '10th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"10th Product for CheckoutSelect","expectText":"10th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st checkbox of product list
I click on popup confirm button
I should not see alert
I fill '19th Product for Checkout' to search field
I click on search product button
I should see select product popup
1st product of popover list should contain '19th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"19th Product for CheckoutSelect","expectText":"19th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st checkbox of product list
I click on popup confirm button
I should see row of selected product
1st row of selected product should contain '10th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"10th Product for CheckoutNT$25 ~ NT$50","expectText":"10th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: 2nd row of selected product should contain '19th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"19th Product for CheckoutNT$5NT$1","expectText":"19th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on countinue to button
I click on 2nd countinue to button
I click on never expires checkbox
I click on end date field
I should see calendar table
I click on 3rd available date button
I click on done button
I click on 3rd countinue to button
I click on preview button
discount summary should equal to 'Purchase 3 items of Selected Products for NT$100'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Purchase 3 items of Selected Products for NT$100","expectText":"Purchase 3 items of Selected Products for NT$100"}

steps.name: I click on confirm button
I should see alert
I should be redirected to Bundle Pricing Index Page
1st row of promotions should contain 'Buy 3 for $100'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"(dirty data) Buy 3 for $1002021/09/24 08:00 AM to2021/09/26 12:00 AMAll Customers 0 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"Buy 3 for $100"}

steps.name: 1st row of promotions should contain end date

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"(dirty data) Buy 3 for $1002021/09/24 08:00 AM to2021/09/26 12:00 AMAll Customers 0 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"2021/09/26"}

steps.name: I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input '19th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain '19th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"19th Product for CheckoutNT$5NT$1","expectText":"19th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill '3' to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
1st item quantity field should equal to '3'
I should not see promotion description
I click on shop all button
I should be redirected to Shop Product Index Page
I input '10th Product for Checkout' to search field
1st product of products list should contain '10th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"10th Product for CheckoutNT$25 ~ NT$50","expectText":"10th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill '3' to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
1st row of cart item should contain '19th Product for Checkout'
2nd row of cart item should contain '10th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"10th Product for CheckoutBlueSBundle(dirty data) Buy 3 for $100NT$50NT$150","expectText":"10th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: promotion description should contain 'Buy 3 for $100'
promotion description should contain '-NT$50'
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included '(DBW) - LocalDelivery' of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","ezship pickup and pay in store","Local Delivery"],"text":"(DBW) - LocalDelivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included 'Custom' of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Taishin","CVS via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","Credit Card via ECpay","LINE Pay","Custom","Cash on Delivery","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","Bank Transfer"],"text":"Custom"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill name to name field
I fill email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I select delivery address dropdown option included "Taipei City" of 1st delivery address dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["          State / City\n        ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County","          District\n        "],"text":"Taipei City"}

steps.name: I select delivery address dropdown option included "100 Zhongzheng District" of 2nd delivery address dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["          State / City\n        ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County","          District\n        ","100 Zhongzheng District","103 Datong District","104 Zhongshan District","105 Songshan District","106 Da'an District","108 Wanhua District","110 Xinyi District","111 Shilin District","112 Beitou District","114 Neihu District","115 Nangang District","116 Wenshan District"],"text":"100 Zhongzheng District"}

steps.name: I fill address to delivery address field
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on accept marketing checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I mark the value of order confirm info as variable order info

embeddings.data:
"Thank you! Your order has been submitted!

steps.name: I click on summary collapse
1st row of product unit price should contain 'NT$1'
1st row of product quantity should equal to '3'
1st row of product items should contain '19th Product for Checkout'
2nd row of product unit price should contain 'NT$50'
2nd row of product quantity should equal to '3'
2nd row of product items should contain '10th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"10th Product for CheckoutBlueSBundle(dirty data) Buy 3 for $100NT$503NT$150","expectText":"10th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: item subtotal should contain 'NT$153'
discount applied should contain 'Buy 3 for $100'
delivery fee should contain 'NT$10'
total should contain 'NT$113'
I am on Orders Page
1st row of order links should contain order number
I click on 1st row of order links
I should be redirected to Orders Show Page
product details should contain 'Buy 3 for $100'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Product DetailsReturn Order Split Edit19th Product for CheckoutBlue3 x NT$1 = NT$3TESTBundle10th Product for CheckoutBlueS3 x NT$50 = NT$150SubtotalNT$153Discount(dirty data) Buy 3 for $100-NT$50Delivery FeeNT$10TotalNT$113","expectText":"Buy 3 for $100"}

steps.name: product details should contain '-NT$50'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Product DetailsReturn Order Split Edit19th Product for CheckoutBlue3 x NT$1 = NT$3TESTBundle10th Product for CheckoutBlueS3 x NT$50 = NT$150SubtotalNT$153Discount(dirty data) Buy 3 for $100-NT$50Delivery FeeNT$10TotalNT$113","expectText":"-NT$50"}

steps.name: total should contain 'NT$113'
I am on Bundle Pricing Index Page
1st row of promotions should contain 'Buy 3 for $100'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"(dirty data) Buy 3 for $1002021/09/24 08:00 AM to2021/09/26 12:00 AMAll Customers 1 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"Buy 3 for $100"}

steps.name: I click on bundle price usage record
I should be redirected to Bundle Pricing History Page
bundle prmotion name should contain 'Buy 3 for $100'
1st row of bundle promotion should contain order number
bundle promotion total should contain 'NT$113'
bundle promotion discounted amount should contain 'NT$50'
I click on export promotions button
I should see confirm button
I click on confirm button
I wait for 60 seconds for mail sent
I am on Google Mail Page
I should see account field
I fill customer email to account field
I click on identifier next button
I should see password field
I input account password to password field
I check and click password next button
I should see search field
I input shop name to search field
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I should see search mail list
I click on row of mail list included 'Download Promotion Report'
